Text: no subtitles exist for this film, at least i havent found any. never got released outside germany or austria, and fan-subtiteling hadnt been invented back then.

Weeeeellll, fan subtitling scene _does_ exist _now_, though.

So, anyone German-speaking out there keen to write English subtitles for this? Even a rough and approximate subtitle track would help...
seeding again as of now, try to keep it shared once you complete the dl!
wunderbar ! better than running man or le prix du danger.. well done sumsums

Can someone Pls seed this rare Tv movie again... I have been looking for this everywhere ....I will surely seed it for a long time once i download it .... 

thanks & regards
